name: Resize It!
description:
Controls PPauseHold SpaceJumpA / Arrow LeftGo LeftD / Arrow RightGo RightLeft mouse buttonShoot magnifying laserRight mouse buttonShoot reducing laser About Game

In this game you have to go through 3 levels, your weapon,  which can control the size of different objects, will help you in passing them.

P.S. Made for "My first game jam".
